title: Strengthening Healthcare Competencies: Item Response Theory (IRT) for Improving Online Course Evaluation Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Core concepts of Item Response Theory (IRT) and its application methods in online assessments can be explained
Procedures for selecting stable assessment items through item difficulty and discrimination analysis can be executed
Methods for collecting and analyzing IRT-based assessment data in mobile environments can be applied to achieve over 80% evaluation reliability

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
